---
title: "Data analysis workflows"
---

This tutorial covers how to organise a data analysis workflow in R, including code style, managing the environment, producing <mark>literate programming</mark> documents, and structuring projects as self-contained and reproducible <mark>research compendiums</mark> of data and code.

## Prerequisites

* Marwick (2016), [Computational Reproducibility in Archaeological Research: Basic Principles and a Case Study of Their Implementation](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10816-015-9272-9), *Journal of Archaeological Method and Theory* 24: 424â€“450.
